attributes.action: Keep A&E services at Telford's PRH.  A reduction of services is not acceptable.
attributes.background: Shropshire is currently serviced by 2 A&E departments, the PRH being one of them.  Telford & Wrekin borough is a highly populated area and with plans for this to grow further.  It requires an up to date hospital with A&E services to ensure the health and welfare of its residents.
